website_summaries.verdict: The best pick if you're looking for a durable, feature-rich mower that can handle any lawn.
pros: Engine is very powerful, yet runs smooth and quiet
Easy to use and keep up
Rich feature set that includes an electric start and blade brake
cons: Mower is on the heavy side
Some buyers report problems with damage during shipping, particularly with the handle bending

website_summaries.verdict: High points for this mower include the electric start and its lightweight maneuverability.
pros: The electric start is a big selling point here
Twin blades mulch even wet grass really fine
cons: Electric start key can vibrate out and get lost, so you should think of tying a rope to it to better keep track of it

customer_reviews.title: Great mower! Easy to start and operate, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing lawn mower! I didn't buy the one that's in most of the home improvement stores. This model has a larger engine and makes mowing a breeze. Adjustable speed control on the handle and select from the bagger or mulching options. I bagged grass for 2-3 weeks before trying the mulcher and it works fantastic! Electric key is another great feature for this machine. This model also has the larger GCV 190 engine which means plenty of power to get you through the thickest grass.
customer_reviews.author: Willie g

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I just assumed the mower would have a superior cut or even just a good one. This mower doesn't leave nice cut blades of grass behind. Looks uneven when done. I'll try to sharpen the blade I guess, but you really shouldn't have to do that with a brand new lawnmower. Also, emptying the bag is a PITA. To fit it in the big brown recycle bags I have to take the frame out first. For the money, I really expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This mower sucks. If you spend this kind of money on a lawnmower it shouldn’t bog down every time you use it. I could have bought a $200 mower and had the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Working very well. Much easier to start that yanking a string.
customer_reviews.text: Working very well. Much easier to start that yanking a string. Had it all summer. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mower cut y’all grass on a steep hill no problem tall grass no problem very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower does a great job. Mulches the grass very well. Adjustable speed works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Was easy to assemble, easy to start. The controls are super easy. Best lawnmover ever.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Solodkin

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Toro
customer_reviews.text: Terrible mulching design. Most all the grass still gets through the chute into the bag. If youtake the bag off the air pressure is not strong enough to shoot it out so it just clogs the outlet shoot. Had Honda Service the machine and replace the chute and they say that's just the way it works... Or rather the way that it doesn't work. Terrible R&D and design on your part Honda. A ton of money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: LoafTheTabby

customer_reviews.title: The best mower Ive ever ownec
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned alot of mowers and this is by far the best I have ever owned. Its so powerful,Ive never had it bog down at all,even when I mow through deeper grass. The key start is amazing and when I pull start, it starts on the first pull every time. Its a little too fast though,I have mine set to the slowest speed and its almost too fast to keep up with,other than that its a perfect mower.
customer_reviews.author: MrMosley

customer_reviews.title: By far the best mower I have owned
customer_reviews.text: By far the best mower I have owned. Starts immediately and cuts like a razor. Mows tall grass without any drag or stall. Didn't think I wanted electric start but honestly, very nice feature
customer_reviews.author: ron morain

customer_reviews.title: Order the protective guarding ASAP of start scuffing up your very expensive mower.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat a Honda mower for reliability and power. I’m not sold on the plastic deck. After one mow I’ve already scuffed up the sides pretty bad mowing close to a block wall. I ordered the protective guards instantly at around $21 shipped. I just feel with mower north $700 before taxes the guards should be standard equipment out the box. The balance is off with a full bag of clippings. The mower will wheelie. That can kinda be dangerous in the right scenario so be sure to empty the bag frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jameeka

customer_reviews.title: Try charging before replacing battery!
customer_reviews.text: Just a note....if the key start fails to turn the engine.... charge the battery....I bought a new one, thinking the battery was going bad, since charging the original battery it turns the engine great.....let me add a new note...engine ran really bad at 2 years old, so I bought a new carburetor and now back in bussiness, when it starts it will sound rought till warmed up then the rpm lines out , still the best, Honda needs to put blade stop on the electric model.....
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Cervi

product_meta.title: Honda HRX217VLA 21" Walk Behind Lawn Mower w/ Electric Start
product_meta.description: Honda's 21 in. HRX217K5VLA featuring NeXite Deck, MicroCut Twin Blade Lawnmower with 4-in-1 Versamow System and Clip Director provides outstanding performance whether mulching, bagging, discharging grass clippings or shredding leaves with no need for additional tools or accessories. It's Self-Propelled with Integrated Select Drive Speed Control for the ultimate in comfort, control and convenience.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars26 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
